Near milepost 407.7, Blue Ridge Parkway. Trail from Buck Spring Gap to summit of Mount Pisgah
Blue Ridge Parkway: Near milepost 407.7. Trail from Buck Spring Gap to summit of Mount Pisgah. Beech dominated shrub community on exposed summit, deciduous forest in lower elevations.
